00047 // This #define allows us to call a method in all
00048 // loaded modules in a readable simple way, e.g.:
00049 // 'FOREACH_MOD OnConnect(user);'
00050 
00051 #define FOREACH_MOD for (int i = 0; i <= MODCOUNT; i++) modules[i]->
